feed.title: Who will run the CoinJoin coordinators?

entry.title: Who will run the CoinJoin coordinators?
entry.summary: The email discusses the dynamic nature of volunteer involvement in a project, highlighting how contributions continually evolve with each commit. It touches upon an initiative aimed at developing a system that operates independently of hardcoded directory nodes or the reliance on specific individuals, including the sender and any coordinators. The sender mentions the necessity for some time before they can share the advantages of this system on the mainnet. This initiative appears to be in response to the challenges posed by a changing roster of volunteers and aims to create a more sustainable and autonomous infrastructure for the project.
